p: The C. limae plant material was collected in January 2010 (8:00 a.m.), from a Brazilian savannah biome named ‘Cerrado’, at the Chapada do Araripe (Araripe Plateau), in the Barreiro Novo County (07° 17.77′ S and 39° 32.62′ W, at 923 m height). Fresh leaves were collected for essential oil extraction and branches with flowers were used for botanical identification. The collection of plant material was performed by Mr. Tiago Rodrigues Leite.
